scepter_desc: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack them for 7 seconds. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges
shard_desc: Counterspell passively grants a 900 radius aura that reduces enemy spell damage by 10%%. Reduces spell damage by an additional 20%% to enemies within 300 range

scepter_desc:
Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants Axe 7 armor per affected target. 

Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown by 3.
shard_desc: Counter Helix now applies a stacking -20% Attack Damage debuff for 6s to enemies hit by it. Increases Counter Helix Chance by 10%.

scepter_desc: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45 seconds. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions takes 700%% incoming damage and immediately dies if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.
shard_desc: Causes Brain Sap to become a 550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 25%.

scepter_desc: Grants Bloodseeker two charges of Rupture and reduces Rupture's Cooldown to 40s
shard_desc: Bloodrage attacks now deal 2% of the targetâ€™s max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

scepter_desc: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.
shard_desc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by %shard_bonus_explosion%%%.

scepter_desc: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
shard_desc: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemy heroes, reducing their regeneration by 10% per stack. Increases damage by 5 per stack. Lasts 7 seconds. If an enemy hero dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal 60 magic damage per stack and 40%% slow for 2 seconds to enemies within 650 radius. Max Stacks: 7

scepter_desc: Enchant Totem becomes a %distance_scepter% range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a 40%% cleave hit.
shard_desc: Reduces Fissure cooldown by 2 seconds and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for half the duration.

scepter_desc: Performs a mini Omnislash for a short duration.
shard_desc: Increases movement speed during Blade Fury by 100 and attacks a random nearby unit once per second dealing 75% damage.

scepter_desc: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies within 500 AoE along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second starfall that deals 50% damage to the impacted unit.
shard_desc: Grants +1 Leap Charge. Leap buff grants Mirana 1.5x Critical Strike attacks for its duration.

scepter_desc: Allows targeting allied heroes. While Morphed, Morphling gains Cast Range increase.
shard_desc: Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.
